Title: The Only Thing That Helps
Writer: Stephen Falk (created by), Franklin Hardy, Shane Kosakowski, Philippe Iujvidin (staff writer)
Actors: Chris Geere, Aya Cash, Desmin Borges, Kether Donohue
Plot: Gretchen and Jimmy hold an unconventional funeral. Paul struggles to give Lindsay what she needs sexually. Edgar takes a stand against the VA.
